Well, if the Maximals are close to the Deceps, then I think it would,
but right now its kinda long-range firing (from what I've seen).


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Isnt all this autogun and base defences also likely to hit
Maximals
> when they are so close to the Decepticons. I think that's why they
never
> used autoguns in the shows, when they were in hand to hand guns.
Some of
> the shots should come close to hitting Maximals, I think.
